videoSnippet.title: The One Above All | Ivanchuk Faces a Deadly Opponent
videoSnippet.description:
Check out the interview with the young gentleman here
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WEMy9rPqrTc

Follow me on Instagram for extra content (Weekly Quiz starting soon) https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Sreeshwan Maralakshikari vs Vassily Ivanchuk
Sunway Sitges International Chess Festival (2018), Barcelona, Spain, rd 1, Dec-14
Benoni Defense: Pawn Storm (A67)

1. d4 c5 2. d5 Nf6 3. c4 e6 4. Nc3 exd5 5. cxd5 d6 6. e4 g6 7. f4 Bg7 8. Bb5+ Nfd7 9. Nf3 a6 10. Bd3 b5 11. O-O O-O 12. Kh1 Re8 13. a3 c4 14. Bc2 Nc5 15. Nd4 Bg4 16. Qxg4 Bxd4 17. f5 Nbd7 18. fxg6 fxg6 19. e5 Bxe5 20. Bxg6 hxg6 21. Qxg6+ Bg7 22. Qf7+ Kh8 23. Qh5+ Kg8 24. Bg5 Qc8 25. Qf7+ Kh8 26. Rf4

Sunway Sitges International Chess Festival started yesterday, December 14th, in Sitges (Barcelona, Spain). You can find all the information about the event at its website www.sunwaychessfestival.com.

The main tournament that we are hosting is a 10-round Swiss Open Tournament (with 34 GMs) featuring GM Andreikin, GM Ivanchuk, GM Inarkiev, GM Sasikiran among other. There are also world number one players in their age group, like Praggnanandhaa, Nihal Sarin, Gukesh D or Raahil Mullick. By the way, Gukesh D. has his last opportunity to become the youngest GM in history if he scores his last GM norm at our event.

There will be one round every day, with no rest days. First 9 rounds will take place at 4:30 p.m. C.E.T., and the 10th and last round will be at 9:30 a.m. on Sunday, December 23rd.

There will be a broadcast on DGT boards of about 30 games. You can find live transmission at http://www.sunwaychessfestival.com/retrans/live/games.pgn.

There is also a live video commentary in English, hosted by Anna Rudolf, with Daniel King today, Levan Aroshidze tomorrow, and Leontxo Garc√≠a from Monday, December 17th, after the great success yesterday with GM Miguel Illescas.

Photo of Ivanchuk by https://twitter.com/davidllada

judgment.name: Blunder
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Re7 was best.
